content:
@klonos Could you have a look at a contributor application from a couple of days ago? See https://github.com/backdrop-ops/contrib/issues/407 and https://github.com/backdrop-ops/contrib/issues/381#issuecomment-620369800.

Application to join: rositis · Issue #407 · backdrop-ops/contrib
The name of your module, theme, or layout Hook Post Action Post a link here to an issue in the drupal.org queue notifying Drupal 7 maintainers that you are working on a Backdrop port of their proje...
Port of Invite module · Issue #381 · backdrop-ops/contrib
Name of the module, theme, or layout you are working on Invite Link to the drupal.org module, theme, or layout https://www.drupal.org/project/invite Link to the drupal.org issue where you notified ...

@klonos - there is a fresh contrib application.

NOTE: Rick came to our VUG last Tuesday and mentioned that he had ported this module for personal use, but did not have it on Github at all. We encouraged him to make his port official and he has emailed me a few times this week asking for advice.

https://github.com/backdrop-ops/contrib/issues/488

Application to join: [Retsell] · Issue #488 · backdrop-ops/contrib
Hello and welcome to the contrib application process! We're happy to have you :) Please note these 3 requirements for new contrib projects: Include a README.md file containing license and maint...
Looks like he is ready to go.
Thanks @StPaulTim :+1: ...I'll get to it as soon as possible.
